People Team Opportunities

People Team - Lisbon (0)

No jobs found.

People Team - Oporto (0)

No jobs found.

People Team - Spontaneous Applications (1)
Candidatura Espontânea - People Team
Read More

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training.

Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market.

Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development.

This is how we fight to go further every day. Together. Connected. As K. As one!

Lisboa: Rua Sousa Martins, nº10 1050-218 Lisboa    info@kcsit.pt                        +351 213 174 164

 

Porto: Edifício Trindade Domus - Rua Alferes Malheiro 97, Piso 2 4000-059 Porto     info.porto@kcsit.pt                    +351 220 002 89 20

 

Açores: Avenida Paço do Milhafre 20A 9760-423, Praia da Vitória Terceira - Portugal     info@kcsit.pt                        +351 29 509 43 53

 

Bruxelas: Silversquare Triomphe Avenue Arnaud Fraiteur 15-23, 1050 Bruxelas, Bélgica    info@kcsit.pt                     +32(0) 465 812 137

 

Follow us Follow us facebook Follow us twitter Follow us linkedin Follow us youtube Follow us instagram

.NET and .NET Core Developer

Amesterdam, Netherlands
Partial Remote Job
Netherlands

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: .NET and .NET Core Developer

 Location: Netherlands

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

  • As a .NET and .NET Core Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining software applications using the Microsoft .NET framework and .NET Core. You will work closely with the software development team to deliver high-quality, scalable, and maintainable solutions.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Minimum of 4 years of experience as a C#.Net Developerin a fast-paced environment
  • Proven experience as a .NET and .NET Core Developer
  • Strong knowledge of C#, ASP.NET, and MVC frameworks
  • Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Familiarity with Entity Framework, LINQ, and SQL Server
  • Experience with unit testing frameworks and test-driven development
  • Knowledge of software development best practices and design patterns
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills-
  • Ability to work independently and in a team environment
  • Proven ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality code
  • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
  • Fluency in German or Duch or French B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
  • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in the Netherland, have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Back
Apply
https://www.cvwarehouse.com/Downloads/ATSCustomerFiles/11191/b1ea37c9-279c-4b62-a1d0-d082be87cacb.png
Back

.NET and .NET Core Developer

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: .NET and .NET Core Developer

 Location: Germany

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

  • As a .NET and .NET Core Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining software applications using the Microsoft .NET framework and .NET Core. You will work closely with the software development team to deliver high-quality, scalable, and maintainable solutions.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Minimum of 4 years of experience as a C#.Net Developerin a fast-paced environment
  • Proven experience as a .NET and .NET Core Developer
  • Strong knowledge of C#, ASP.NET, and MVC frameworks
  • Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Familiarity with Entity Framework, LINQ, and SQL Server
  • Experience with unit testing frameworks and test-driven development
  • Knowledge of software development best practices and design patterns
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills-
  • Ability to work independently and in a team environment
  • Proven ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality code
  • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
  • Fluency in German or Duch or French B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
  • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in Germany have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

.NET and .NET Core Developer

Bruxelas, Belgium
Partial Remote Job
Belgium

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: .NET and .NET Core Developer

 Location: Belgium

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

  • As a .NET and .NET Core Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining software applications using the Microsoft .NET framework and .NET Core. You will work closely with the software development team to deliver high-quality, scalable, and maintainable solutions.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Minimum of 4 years of experience as a C#.Net Developerin a fast-paced environment
  • Proven experience as a .NET and .NET Core Developer
  • Strong knowledge of C#, ASP.NET, and MVC frameworks
  • Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Familiarity with Entity Framework, LINQ, and SQL Server
  • Experience with unit testing frameworks and test-driven development
  • Knowledge of software development best practices and design patterns
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills-
  • Ability to work independently and in a team environment
  • Proven ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality code
  • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
  • Fluency in German or Duch or French B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
  • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in Belgium, have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

.NET CORE Developer

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: .NET CORE Developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science or similar 
  • 4+ years of professional experience development with .NET Core, .NET Framework, C#, Asp.Net, and RESTfull services
  • Experience working with SQL databases such as Microsoft SQL Server and NoSQL (such as Mongo DB) 
  • Experience in Azure Kubernetes Services, Azure App Services, Azure functions, Azure logic Apps Azure Storage is a plus
  • Experienced in taking ownership of tasks, commitments, and quality, and contributing to a culture of continuous improvement in an Agile/Scrum environment
  • Effective unit, integration, and user acceptance testing  
  • Strong knowledge Building CI /CD pipelines 
  • Container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes 
  • Fluency in English and/or French 
  • Self-motivated and detail-oriented team player with a desire to work on a team and mentor team members when necessary

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Back

.Net Developer

Lisboa, Portugal
100% Remote Job / Full Remote
Full Remote

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: .Net Developer

Seniority: Senior (+5 years)

Type of position: Full Remote from Portugal

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • 5+ years of experience developing web applications;
  • Know your way around relational databases and also non-relational stores;
  • Passionate about areas such as Development, Architecture, Software Engineering and, possibly, Team and Project Management;
  • Experience leading development teams;
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills are essential;
  • A strong will to continuously learn, teach, improve and make others grow;
  • You must speak English and Portuguese fluently;
  • Currently living in Portugal

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

.NET developer

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: .NET developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • .NET 4, NET 8, NET Standard 
  • Experience with C# for backend application programming 
  • Knowledge in SOLID principles and design patterns 
  • Coding according to good practices, enforcing them in Pull Request approvals 
  • Unit and integration testing experience
  • Knowledge with Jenkins, Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket
  • B2 English Level

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

.NET Developer

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: .NET Developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be already living in Portugal!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or relevant field;
  • 3+ years of experience working with .NET or relevant experiences;
  • Experience developing web-based applications in C#, .NET Core and cloud is a plus;
  • Experience working with MS SQL Server and MySQL;
  • Knowledge of practices and procedures for full software design life cycle;
  • Fluent spoken and written English and Portuguese.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

.NET senior with Azure services

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: .NET senior with Azure services

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Experience with C#, .Net, .NETcore, MVC/WebAPI, REST, Azure platform as Azure Blog Storage, Azure DevOps Pipelines, Azure Functions, CI/CD pipelines, Azure Event Bus
  • B2 English Level

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Alnova Mid-Level Application Developer

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Alnova Mid-Level Application Developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Braga. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have: 

  • Your duties will involve designing, developing, and maintaining software applications using Alnova Financial Solutions, ensuring clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
  • Thorough testing and debugging are essential, along with staying updated on emerging trends in software engineering.
  • You should also have experience in project management and team leadership.
  • You'll be expected to handle 2 to 3 low/medium complexity projects simultaneously, overseeing their entire life cycle.
  • This includes managing delivery plans, ensuring technical solution quality, and addressing requirements with clients.
  • Knowledge of the banking sector is necessary, with preferable familiarity with ALNOVA/ALTAMIRA architectures.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Angular Developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • 6 or 9+ years of experience in Front-end Development with Angular for new implementations;

  • Knowledge in SOLID principles;
  • Experience with relational databases (SQL Server) is a plus;

  • 4+ years of experience in IT Support

  • Experience with ticketing tools (Active Directory, and Jira/Snow;) and incident management processes

  • Familiarity with monitoring tools for proactive issue identification and resolution

Lisboa, Portugal
100% Remote Job / Full Remote

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Atlassian Consultant

The amazing you, will have:

  • +4 years of proven experience with Atlassian Suite from Jira, Confluence to Jira Assets;
  • +4 years of experience with macros, plugins, EazyBI reporting, structures, filter integration and Jira Asset;
  • Experience in an agile context and agile frameworks like SAFe;
  • Demonstrable experience in automation possibilities within the Atlassian Suite e.g. automation of worksflows or user management;
  • Experience in Jira Service Desk ;
  • Integration of Jira Asset with Sharepoint;
  • Creating reports in PowerBI;
  • Experience in Aptio Target Process;
  • Fluent in English and be in Portugal is mandatory

AWS Cloud Engineer

Bruxelas, Belgium
Partial Remote Job
Belgium

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: AWS Cloud Engineer

 Location: Belgium

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

  • As a Senior AWS Cloud Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing our cloud infrastructure in Amazon Web Services (AWS). You will work closely with our development and operations teams to ensure the reliability, scalability, and security of our applications and systems.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Cloud Engineer, preferably with a focus on AWS
  • Extensive experience with AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, etc.
  • Strong understanding of networking and security principles in a cloud environment
  • Experience with infrastructure as code tools like Terraform or CloudFormation
  • Proficient in scripting languages such as Python or Bash
  • Knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
  • AWS certification (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate or Professional) is a plus
  • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
  • Fluency in German or Duch or French B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
  • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in Belgium and/or have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: AWS Cloud Engineer

 Location: Germany

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

  • As a Senior AWS Cloud Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing our cloud infrastructure in Amazon Web Services (AWS). You will work closely with our development and operations teams to ensure the reliability, scalability, and security of our applications and systems.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Cloud Engineer, preferably with a focus on AWS
  • Extensive experience with AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, etc.
  • Strong understanding of networking and security principles in a cloud environment
  • Experience with infrastructure as code tools like Terraform or CloudFormation
  • Proficient in scripting languages such as Python or Bash
  • Knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
  • AWS certification (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate or Professional) is a plus
  • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
  • Fluency in German or Duch or French B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
  • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in Germany and/or have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Azure Cloud Engineer

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position:  Azure Cloud Engineer

 Location: Germany

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators

 

As a Senior Azure Cloud Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing our clients' cloud infrastructure on the Microsoft Azure platform. Your expertise in implementing cloud solutions, managing and optimizing cloud resources, and ensuring system reliability and security will be crucial to the success of our projects.

In this role, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including software engineers and architects, to understand project requirements and translate them into scalable and reliable cloud infrastructure solutions. You will also work closely with clients to gather their specific needs, provide technical consultations, and ensure smooth deployments and integration with existing systems.

This is an excellent opportunity for a highly motivated and self-driven individual with strong problem-solving skills and a passion for cloud technologies. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, enjoy taking on new challenges, and have a strong background in Microsoft Azure cloud services, we want to hear from you.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in designing, deploying, and managing cloud infrastructure on the Microsoft Azure platform
  • Strong knowledge of Azure services such as Virtual Machines, Virtual Networks, Azure Active Directory, and Azure Storage
  • Proficient in infrastructure-as-code frameworks such as Terraform or ARM templates
  • Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
  • Solid understanding of networking concepts and protocols
  • Familiarity with scripting languages such as PowerShell or Python
  • Certifications in Microsoft Azure or other relevant certifications are highly desired
  • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
  • Fluency in German B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
  • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in the Germany and/or have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Back

Azure Data Engineer

Lisboa, Portugal
100% Remote Job / Full Remote
Full Remote

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Azure Data Engineer

Seniority: Senior (+5 years)

Type of position: Full Remote from Portugal

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • 4 years of experience working as Data Engineer;
  • Experience developing data driven applications and ETL environments;
  • Knowledge or experience with Python, Java or Scala;
  • Experience in cloud environments such as AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform ;
  • Experience with software tools such as Spark, Hive or Databricks;
  • Good organizational skills, autonomy and proactivity;
  • Good interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

BI Specialist (Dutch Speaker)

Amesterdam, Netherlands
Partial Remote Job
Netherlands

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

 

Position: BI Specialist (Dutch Speaker)

Location: Hengelo, Netherlands

Type: Hybrid (once a week in the office)

Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing and designing dashboards in PowerBI, performing ETL activities, and contributing to the improvement of work processes. This role requires a proactive, flexible, and enthusiastic individual with a deep understanding of business intelligence tools and methodologies.

 

  • Bachelor’s degree in IT, Business & IT, or a related field.
  • At least 4 years of experience as a BI Specialist.

 

  • Technical Skills:

Experience with Cognos.

Proficiency in PowerBI.

Experience with an ETL tool, preferably SSIS (SQL Server Integration Services).

Experience with cubes, preferably SSAS (SQL Server Analysis Services) Tabular.

Knowledge and experience with Kimball dimensional data modeling is a plus.

 

  • Nice to Have: Knowledge of Mendix is a plus.

 

  • Soft Skills:

Ability to proactively align business information requests with technical capabilities.

Proactive, flexible, go-getter attitude, and enthusiastic.

Good understanding of the English language.

 

  • Must have / Mandatory:

Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)

Fluency in Dutch B2 (Mandatory

Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates must live in The Netherlands and have European citizenship OR are willing to relocate to the Netherlands and have European citizenship

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

 

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Big Data - Scala

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Big Data - Scala

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in MIS, Computer Science, Engineering or a related field
  • 4-5 years of work experience, with a preference for experience in Big Data Interest in API’s development
  • High Proficiency in developing with Scala, Spark, Hadoop, and Hive
  • Experience around Java, SpringBoot, API’s and microservices
  • High Proficiency with relational databases

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Business Analyst

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Business Analyst

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

 
  • 5 years of experience as Business Analyst in Technology informations area.
  • Mandatory experience in Fintech or baking companies.
  • Mandatory Knowledge of finances transactions, forex, equaties and fixing income, and related themes in economic field.
  • Gathering requirements and creating functional specifications for enhancements and/or bug fixes in several teams and stakeholders.
  • Participation in projects in the scope of the stream.
  • Providing first level support to users.
  • Testing developed functionalities.
  • Be autonomous, organized, and methodical.
  • Be proactive and not afraid to ask questions.
  • knowledge of SQL.
  • Knowledge of French language is a plus.
  • Have an effective operational efficiency/advanced level of English – at least C1.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Business Analyst

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
Lisbon

We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Business Analyst

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • 4+ years of experience;
  • Have a degree in Economics or Accounting (or related). Knowledge of FX&FI/Corporate lending/Finance would be helpful in this role;
  • BS/MS in Finance, Engineering or Computer Science preferred;
  • Experience on Operational, Finance & Regulatory Reporting related topics is a plus;
  • Experience with multiple types of analysis: current state operating model, data reconciliation, quality review, workflow analysis, process improvement, strategic vision, and functional requirements;
  • Strong experience on agile methodologies (Jira is a plus);
  • Strong experience on process design, implementation and testing;
  • Good SQL skills;
  • Capability to interact with different users;
  • Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build working relationships across the organization;
  • French is a plus.
  • Experience driving system implementation, developing and executing testing strategies, supporting model validation and remediation;
  • Must be able to work both independently and collaboratively with local and global teams;
  • Excellent time management skills with ability to multi-task and prioritize workload, while maintaining high attention to detail and meet deadlines;
  • Previous experience in banking is a plus;
  • Very good communication in English, both orally and written.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Finance, Business Administration, or related field;
  • 4+ years of experience as IT Business Analyst;
  • Experience with SQL and visualization tools (PowerBI, Tableau, or similar);
  • Experience defining Roadmaps, Solutions Scope, gathering requirements and UAT;

  • Excellent communication, interpersonal, and stakeholder management skills;
  • Availability for a hybrid regime at Porto (Portugal);
  • Fluency in English is mandatory.

  • As a Software-Developer C++ your mission it's implementing new features and fixing bugs.
  • In this role you collaborate with other developers, UX designers, QA and DevOps.
  • Degree in computer science with more than 5 years’ experience as Software Developer working with C++
  • Experience with coding and debugging issues on both Windows and Linux
  • Familiar with software development standard processes and tools for continuous integration, source code version control, build management, compile and linkage

Candidatura Espontânea - People Team

Porto, Portugal
People Team - Spontaneous Applications

Founded in 2008, KCS IT is a consultancy company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for its clients through three main areas: Consulting, Technology and Training.

 

Finding competent, creative and willing professionals to accept the challenges of the labor market is increasingly difficult. For that it is necessary to choose well the company where you will develop your career!

 

Here, you can be totally sure about this: we value each person that joins us. We welcome everyone as part of this family and we do everything we can so that we can learn and grow together.

 

Are you ready to join our family?

Cloud Engineer

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Cloud Engineer

Seniority: Junior (1-3 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Braga. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Managing cloud platforms (Azure) and their services efficiently, with a primary emphasis on automation.
  • Covering aspects like Routing, OSI Stack, Load Balancers, NAT, Network Isolation, Security Groups, and Logging and monitoring tools like Elk.
  • Proficiency in Linux.
  • 1x/week at the office in Braga

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Cloud Engineer

Porto, Portugal
100% Remote Job / Full Remote
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Cloud Engineer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Full Remote from Portugal. The candidates must be in Portugal.

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Significant programming experience in Python and TypeScript.
  • Proficiency with Data Base (especially Postgres or MySQL) 
  • In-depth knowledge of Elasticsearch and its integration. 
  • Extensive experience with managed services on AWS, particularly with Lambda and other function-as-a-service (FaaS) solutions.
  • English Level - B2
 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

Cobol Developer

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Cobol Developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's / Master's degree in the field of information technology or similar;
  • Professional experience of +3 years as a Cobol developer;
  • Knowledge with DB2, CICS, JCL;
  • Oral and written fluency in English would be nice;
  • Portuguese would be mandatory;
  • Available to do a hybrid model in Lisbon

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid model in Lisbon. Candidate be already in Lisbon is mandatory.!!!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's/master's degree in the area of information technologies or other areas relevant to the position;
  • Experience +4 years as a Cobol Developer;
  • Knowledge of Cobol, DB2, JCL, CICS;
  • Oral and written fluency in Portuguese;
  • Experience in working on Agile environments;
  • Strong interpersonal and communicational skills;
  • Available to do a hybrid model in Lisbon.
 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;

    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

COBOL Développeur - French Speaker

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: COBOL Développeur - French Speaker

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates need to be ALREADY living in Portugal.

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field;
  • Minimum +6 years of experience working with COBOL;
  • Extensive understanding of Banking processes with expertise in Customers & Accounts, Taxation, Payments (Target, Swift, SEPA DD and CT), Credit, and Risks;
  • Proven experience in COBOL development, CiCS, and DB2;
  • Preferably, familiarity with Altamira architecture;
  • Valuable experience (though not mandatory) in integrations between Core (Mainframe) and Middleware (distributed systems);
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills;
  • Proactive mindset towards problem-solving and learning;
  • Availability for a hybrid regime in Lisbon;
  • Fluency in FRENCH is a MANDATORY.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Data Analyst/Data Scientist

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Data Analyst/Data Scientist

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. The candidate must be in Lisbon!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor´s Degree at Computer Science, Information Technology or similar;
  • +3 years of experience as Data Analyst/Data Scientist;
  • Experience with SQL;
  • Experience with PowerBI and/or Tableau;
  • Experience with cloud (AWS, GCP or Azure) is a plus;
  • Experience with R is a plus;
  • Experience with SSRS is a plus;
  • Experience with SAS is a plus;
  • Experience with Python;
  • Fluent in English;
  • Must be in Lisbon (hybrid);

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.
