Data Scientist with Azure- Algorithmic Trading

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

 

Position: Data Scientist with Azure- Algorithmic Trading

Location: Remote from the EU, with occasional onsite work in Essen, Germany

Type: Hybrid

 

As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge algorithms and models to drive strategic decision-making in the field of algorithmic trading. Your work will directly impact the success and profitability of our trading strategies. You will implement, monitor, and improve machine learning models and pipelines and implement CI/CD pipelines and MLOps best practices.

 

Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field
  • At least 4 years as a data scientist or similar, with proven experience in developing and implementing algorithms for algorithmic trading
  • Proficient in implementing AI/ML models for trading purposes
  • Strong understanding of financial markets and trading strategies
  • Strong ability to write Python code for model implementation, training, and feature engineering.
  • Experience in setting up Azure Machine Learning and Data Factory pipelines.
  • Familiarity with AzureDevOps, including CI/CD, backlog management, and sprint planning.
  • Fluent English is mandatory;
  • German proficiency is a plus

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

 

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

  • Vast experience with running a large-scale operation on AWS, Azure or GCP;

  • Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g. Bash, Python);

DevOps

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
Oporto

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: DevOps

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • 4+ years as a DevOps engineer;
  • Experience with Prometheus, Grafana, Opentelemetry – Must;
  • Vast experience with running a large-scale operation on AWS, Azure or GCP;
  • High analytical and troubleshooting skills;
  • Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g. Bash, Python);
  • Experience with CI/CD best practices and tools (CirclcCI, ArgoCD);
  • Experience with Kubernetes;
  • CKA certification is a big plus

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Full Remote

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: DevOps

Seniority: Senior (+5 years)

Type of position: Full Remote from Portugal

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • 5 years minimum of experience as a DevOps;
  • Solid experience with continuous integration (CI/CD) tools;
  • Experience with scripting languages like Bash or Python and Yocto;
  • Experience with automation tools like Ansible and Jenkins;
  • Experience with containerization tools like Docker;
  • Experience with monitoring tools like Prometheus is a plus;
  • Experience with Azure DevOps is a plus;
  • Experience with Terraform is a plus;
  • You must speak English fluently

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;

    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

DevOps

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: DevOps

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • +4 years experience in DevOps roles, with a focus on building and deploying scalable and reliable applications;
  • Mastering of the new technological stacks (Elastic Search, Grafana, Dynatrace …) for the service monitoring, with an understanding of the DevOps chain (Gitlab, Artifactory, Jenkins, SonarQube, Mattermost, Ansible, …);
  • Knowledge Linux and Windows system;
  • Mastering Docker and Kubernetes;
  • Knowledge about Helm;
  • Experience with at least one programming language (Golang, C#, Java, Python, etc.);
  • Proficiency in scripting and automation using languages like Python, Bash, or PowerShell;
  • Experience with configuration management tools like Ansible, Chef, or Puppet;
  • Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker, container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes, with CI/CD and other DevOps tools (Git, Jenkins, etc.);
  • Familiarity with cloud computing platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud;
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues;
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams;
  • Proficiency in written and spoken English (mandatory);
  • Availability for a hybrid regime at Porto (Portugal).
 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

DevOps Engineer

Lisboa, Portugal
100% Remote Job / Full Remote
Full Remote

We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: DevOps Engineer

Seniority: Senior (+5 years)

Type of position: Full Remote from Portugal

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • 4+ years as a DevOps engineer;
  • Experience with Prometheus, Grafana, Opentelemetry;
  • Experience with K8S;
  • Vast experience with running a large-scale operation on AWS or GCP or Azure;
  • High analytical and troubleshooting skills;
  • Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g. Bash, Python);
  • Experience with CI/CD best practices and tools (CirclcCI, ArgoCD);
  • You will be responsible for the Observability tools, like Prometheus, Grafana, Opentelemetry & etc;
  • Manage high-scale cloud infrastructure and services, optimizing for performance, stability, cost, and reliability;
  • Mentor, inspire DevOps engineers, ensuring high performance and collaboration;
  • Collaborate across teams to align DevOps activities with business objectives

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

The amazing you, will have:

  • +4 years experience in DevOps roles, with a focus on building and deploying scalable and reliable applications;
  • Experience with at least one programming language (Golang, C#, Java, Python, etc.);
  • Proficiency in scripting and automation using languages like Python, Bash, or PowerShell;
  • Experience with configuration management tools like Ansible, Chef, or Puppet;

DevOps Engineer

Amesterdam, Netherlands
Partial Remote Job
Netherlands

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: DevOps Engineer

 Location: Netherlands

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

As DevOps Senior, you will be responsible for the integration of development and operations through the implementation and management of tools and processes that enable continuous integration, deployment, and delivery of software. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth and efficient operations of our systems and applications.

  •  

    Technical and Soft Skills:

    • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
    • Minimum of 4 years of experience as DevOps Engineer in a fast-paced environment
    • Proficient in scripting languages such as Bash, Python, or Ruby
    • Strong knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
    • Experience with configuration management tools like Ansible or Chef
    • Expertise in managing and troubleshooting Linux-based systems
    • Familiar with source control systems like Git or Bitbucket
    • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
    • Strong communication and collaboration abilities
    • AWS or Azure certification is a plus
    • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
    • Fluency in Dutch B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
    • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in the Netherlands, have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

DevOps Engineer

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: DevOps Engineer

 Location: Germany

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

As DevOps Senior, you will be responsible for the integration of development and operations through the implementation and management of tools and processes that enable continuous integration, deployment, and delivery of software. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth and efficient operations of our systems and applications.

  •  

    Technical and Soft Skills:

    • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
    • Minimum of 4 years of experience as DevOps Engineer in a fast-paced environment
    • Proficient in scripting languages such as Bash, Python, or Ruby
    • Strong knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
    • Experience with configuration management tools like Ansible or Chef
    • Expertise in managing and troubleshooting Linux-based systems
    • Familiar with source control systems like Git or Bitbucket
    • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
    • Strong communication and collaboration abilities
    • AWS or Azure certification is a plus
    • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
    • Fluency in German B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
    • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in Germany, have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth and efficient operations of our systems and applications.

DevSecOps Engineer

Lisboa, Portugal
100% Remote Job / Full Remote
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: DevSecOps Engineer

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Full Remote from Portugal. The candidates must be in Portugal.

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • +4 years of Experience as DevSecOps Engineer;
  • Experience in Azure Cloud, Azure DevOps, and Azure Security;
  • Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab);
  • Experience with Docker and Kubernetes;
  • Experience with Terraform and Ansible;
  • Experience with security tools (e.g., SAST, DAST, SCA, SIEM);
  • Experience with NIST-800 is a big plus;
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Good communication skills;
  • Fluent in English (mandatory);
  • Must be in Portugal (mandatory)

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

Experienced SAP TDF Consultant

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: Experienced SAP ISU (SAP Industry Solution for Utilities)

 Location: Frankfurt, Germany

Type: Hybrid position Job from Frankfurt

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.
  • As a Senior SAP ISU professional, you will be responsible for ensuring that the SAP ISU module is running smoothly and meeting the needs of our organization. You will work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and design solutions to meet their business needs. Additionally, you will be responsible for configuring the SAP ISU module to align with business processes, as well as troubleshooting and resolving any issues that arise.

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Minimum of 4 years of experience working with the SAP ISU module
  • Strong understanding of the utilities industry and business processes
  • Experience in full-cycle SAP implementation projects
  • Proficient in SAP ISU configuration and customization
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team
  • SAP ISU certification is a plus
  • Fluency in English (Mandatory)
  • Intermediate in German (is a plus)
  • Is a hybrid position from Germany, so the candidates must have European Passport and willing to relocate to Germany, or visa work permit to Germany (mandatory)

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Firmware Tester

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Firmware Tester

Seniority: Junior (1-3 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in software or electronic field.
  • Understanding of Quality Assurance test methodologies.
  • Experience working with debug and report internal and/or external issues using Jira an Git.
  • Experience configuring, connecting and managing devices onto Ethernet based networks.
  • Hands on Electro-mechanical installation skills.
  • Must demonstrate superior ability to understand, analyze and assess a wide variety of complex business and/or firmware development issues.
  • Understanding of basic networking including Ip addressing: Gateways, DNS, DHCP.
  • Proficient in Python programming language.
  • Experience in developing and maintaining automated test scripts using Python.
  • Familiarity with popular Python testing libraries.
  • Understanding of Python virtual environments and package management.
  • Must demonstrate excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Is able to organize and present ideas in a convincing and compelling manner to a small and large audience.
  • English fluent Portuguese fluent.

 

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

  • Minimum of 3 years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role in a software development setting

  • Prior experience with systems like Nginx, apache tomcat, redis, postgreSQL, elasticsearch and cloud

  • Fluency in English is mandatory
  • Hybrid model in Lisbon.

Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Fullstack Java/React

Seniority: Senuir (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

- Experience: 10+ years in software development with a preference for long-term project involvement over the last 5 years.

- Technical Expertise: 

  • Java 17+ and Spring Boot framework 
  • React (version 16 and above) 
  • API and REST API development 
  • RabbitMQ 
  • Microservice architecture 
  • Cloud technologies and frameworks 
  • Agile methodologies and tools (Scrum/Kanban, Jira) 

- Web Development: Comprehensive understanding of the web development process (design, development, deployment)

- Software Architecture: Strong knowledge of software architecture, design principles (SOLID, design patterns), and best practices

- Testing: Experience with unit testing using JUnit, Mockito, or similar libraries; unit testing in React

- Additional Skills:

  • Knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, and related libraries
  • Experience with build tools (Gradle, Maven) and continuous integration principles and tools

- NoSQL Databases: Understanding of MongoDB or similar

- B2 English Level

 

Why should you become part of our family?

    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field;
  • 5+ years of experience in Testing activities;
  • Solid understanding of software testing concepts, methodologies, and best practices;
  • Proficiency in developing test plans, test cases, analyzing requirements and risk identification;
  • Experience in leading QA teams;
  • Experience with SQL, Quality Center and API’s;
  • Attention to detail and the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks effectively;
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills;
  • Availability for a hybrid regime at Lisbon (Portugal);

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Java + Rust Developer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Remote from Portugal. The candidate has to be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • 4+ years of professional experience in software development with a focus on JAVA.
  • 1+ years of professional experience in software development with RUST.
  • Strong understanding of object-oriented and functional programming paradigms.
  • Experience with frameworks and libraries such as Spring, Hibernate, Actix, or Rocket.
  • Proficiency in version control systems, preferably Git.
  • Knowledge of RESTful API design and implementation.
  • Familiarity with database systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Fluency in English is mandatory.
  • Availability for a REMOTE regime (candidates need to be living ALREADY in Portugal).

    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!

Java Developer

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: Java Developer

 Location: Germany

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

As a Senior Java Developer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing complex software solutions. You will play a key role in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our applications.

The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in Java development, along with a solid understanding of software development principles and practices. You should have a strong problem-solving mindset and a keen eye for detail. You should also be able to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team.

This is an excellent opportunity to join a fast-paced, innovative organization and make a significant impact on our software development projects.

.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
  • 5+ years of experience in Java development
  • Solid understanding of software development principles and design patterns
  • Proficiency in Java, J2EE, and related technologies
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Experience with Agile methodologies and tools
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  • Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git
  • Knowledge of SQL and relational database systems
  • Experience with web application development frameworks, such as Spring or Hibernate
  • Familiarity with cloud (AWS or Azure) to deploy applications
  • Fluency English C1 (Mandatory)
  • Fluency in German or Duch or French B1 or B2 (Mandatory)
  • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in Germany have European citizenship and want to relocate.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Belgium

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

 Location: Belgium

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;

  • Knowledge of SQL and relational database systems

  • Familiarity with cloud (AWS or Azure) to deploy applications

Java Developer + Scrum Master

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing:  Java Developer + Scrum Master 

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon The candidate must be in Portugal!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar (nice to have)
  • 3 years of experience as a java developer and scrum master;
  • Desing, implement and maintain java applications; Knowledge of Java8, J2EE, XML, SQL, JDBC, MQ brokers and JMS;
  • Comfortable participating in all phases of the development lifecycle; Strong knowledge of Agile Scrum principles and practices;
  • Fluent in English and French is mandatory;
  • Be already living and legal in Lisbon is mandatory.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science or in a related field 
  • 4+ years of experience developing in JAVA 
  • Deep knowledge of Java eco-system: Web sevices / API (JAX-WS, REST/JSON) JPA/ Hibernate Junit, Mockito
  • 2+ years of experience with Angular 2+ (preferably Angular 13) JavaScript, Typescript, HTML, CSS
  • Understanding relational databases such as Oracle
  • Experience with continuous integration principles and tools: Git, Maven, Jenkins, Artifactory 
  • Familiarity with Agile methodologies such as Scrum
  • Participate in code reviews
  • Follow community best practices 
  • Knowledge of tomcat, Jboss, Spring Batch, Batch and Shell Scripting
  • Junit or other automated unit testing framework
  • At least B2 English Level

 

Why should you become part of our family?

    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

We are looking for an Amazing: Linux Administrator

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. The candidate must be in Lisbon!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Responsible for physical and virtual infrastructures;
  • Responsible for Linux systems;
  • Responsibility for ensuring the functioning of Core and Corporate Services based on Linux technologies;
  • Management/Installation/Maintenance of physical or virtual servers;
  • Management/Installation/Maintenance of basic virtualization platforms in Linux;
  • Management of IT solution implementation projects;
  • Management of infrastructure and systems modernization projects;
  • Management of Internet services, e-mail, dns, http;
  • 3rd line support for Customers;
  • 24x7 prevention;
  • Incident resolution

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Mid/Senior Java Developer German Speaker

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: Mid/Senior Java Developer German Speaker

 Location: Germany

Type: Hybrid Position

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java development, microservices architecture, design patterns, unit testing, and cloud technologies. Proficiency in German at least at a B2 level is essential for this role.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Java Development: Design, develop, and maintain robust Java applications.
  • Microservices: Architect and implement microservices-based solutions ensuring scalability and performance.
  • Design Patterns: Apply design patterns to create efficient and maintainable code.
  • Unit Testing: Write and maintain unit tests to ensure high-quality code and functionality.
  • Cloud Integration: Develop and deploy applications in cloud environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver solutions.
  • Continuous Improvement: Participate in code reviews and contribute to the improvement of development processes.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

    • Several years of hands-on experience in Java development.
    • Proven experience with microservices architecture.
    • Strong knowledge of design patterns.
    • Experience with unit testing frameworks (e.g., JUnit, TestNG).
    • Proficiency in cloud technologies and environments (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
    • Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes).
    • Understanding of RESTful API design and development.
    • Proficiency in German at least at a B2 level.
    • Good command of English for technical communication.
    • Is hybrid position so is mandatory that candidates live in Germany have European citizenship and want to relocate.

          Nice to Have:

    • Additional Frameworks: Experience with Spring Boot, Hibernate.
    • DevOps: Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI).
    • Agile Methodologies: Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in a related field (e.g., Cybersecurity, Information Technology, Risk Management) or equivalent work experience.
  • 3+ years of experience as a Murex Developer, with strong expertise in Murex 3.1 or higher.
  • Proficiency in Murex modules such as Front Office, Back Office, Risk, and Datamart.
  • Strong programming skills in languages such as SQL, Unix/Linux scripting, and MxML (Murex XML).
  • Pre and post-trade workflows knowledge MRA/MRB module experience PL analysis and simulation screens experience.
  • Experience with Murex integration and interface development (e.g., Datamart, workflows, Market Data, Trade Interface).
  • Experience with Scripting Shell, Strong SQL (Oracle), PL SQL, Unix/Linux, XSLT/XSL/XML/HTML SOAP, Java + Maven, Python, GIT.
  • Knowledge of financial instruments, trading, and risk management concepts.
  • Fluency in English is mandatory.
  • Availability for a hybrid regime, 2x/week, at Porto (Portugal)

Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Python Developer

Seniority: junior (1-3 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be already living in Portugal!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor / Master in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • Minimum 2 years experience;
  • Proficient in Python and Django, with a good knowledge of its ecosystem and architectural patterns;
  • Experience with SQL and any industry standard relational database;
  • Experience with unit, integration and end to end testing;
  • Good Level of English;
  • The candidate has to be in Lisbon - Hybrid Position.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

  • Experience with frameworks (Django/Flask)

  • Experience with unit testing
  • Experience with RestAPIs

  • Experience in Java programming language (for writing Cucumber glue code)
  • Experience with the full software development lifecycle, including design the test plan to test execution, implementation, and documentation activities

  • Experience with Agile/Scrum.

Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: QA Automation Engineer/Tester - QAE

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field;
  • 5+ years of experience with Automation Testing, being expert in designing, developing, and delivering robust and resilient automated test suites with QA Automation tools, specially with Cypress (but also Selenium, Appium, Cucumber, JUnit, TestNG, etc.);
  • Strong programming skills in languages are a plus (such as Javascript, Typescript, Node, or others);
  • Knowledgeable and adept in creating test scenarios and scripts for Test Automation to run on CI/CD pipelines, including experience with container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, etc.) and other DevOps tools (Git, Jenkins, etc.);
  • Ability to thrive in a high-growth environment, and skilled in writing clean code, following the best practices, and providing excellent test automation coverage;
  • Experience with Clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus;
  • Expertise in Agile methodologies, including relevant experience working in an Agile team environment;
  • Effective communication skills, including the ability to articulate complex, technical ideas and concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences;
  • Proficiency in written and spoken English (mandatory).

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;

    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

QAE

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: QAE

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor degree in computer related discipline or equivalent ;
  • QA certification or equivalent accreditation (e.g. ISTQB);
  • Minimum 3 years’ experience in an IT QA software tester role;
  • Preferred 1 year in automated principles and tooling experience;
  • Experinece with Jira, Automation testing principles (APIs) & tools, TestRail, SQL skills, Confluence ,Cypress, Selenium, Postman, Test Complete, TestRail, Jenkins, JMeter;
  • Fluent in English;
  • Hybrid Position - Porto.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

QAE - Quality Assurance Engineer

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing:  QAE - Quality Assurance Engineer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto The candidate must be in Portugal!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor/Master in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • Minimum of 4 years of experience in Automation Tests;
  • Background in Java development (even academic, would be nice);
  • Experience with testing tools such as Java, Selenium, Given, API's, testrails, etc.;
  • Experience with cypress, postman, jenkins and jmeter would be nice;
  • Fluency in English and Portuguese;
  • ISTQB is a plus;
  • Be already in Portugal and available for a hybrid model in Oporto -3x/week

    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!

Qualifizierung (Qualification Specialist)

Frankfurt, Germany
Partial Remote Job
Germany

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: Qualifizierung (Qualification Specialist) - Qualifizierung Specialist in a Lab (Routine Analytics)

 Location:  Frankfurt, Germany

Type: Hybrid Position

Start Date: Within 1 month

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Chemistry, Biochemistry, Pharmaceutical Sciences, or a related field.
  • 1 to 3 years of experience in laboratory qualification and routine analytics.
  • Strong understanding of laboratory equipment qualification protocols and regulatory requirements.
  • Proficiency in German (both written and spoken) is mandatory.
  • Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot technical issues.
  • Native in Germany (Mandatory)
  • Start Date: Within 1 month

 

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Qualification of Laboratory Devices:

    • Perform qualification and validation of laboratory instruments and equipment.
    • Develop and maintain qualification protocols, reports, and related documentation.
    • Ensure all devices meet regulatory and internal quality standards.

  2. Routine Analytics:

    • Support routine analytical testing by ensuring equipment is qualified and operational.
    • Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to lab equipment qualification.
    • Assist in the implementation of new analytical methods and technologies.

  3. Documentation and Compliance:

    • Maintain accurate records of all qualification activities.
    • Ensure compliance with Good Laboratory Practice (GLP) and other regulatory requirements.
    • Prepare documentation for audits and inspections.

  4. Collaboration and Training:

    • Work closely with the QC team and other departments to coordinate qualification activities.
    • Provide training and support to lab personnel on the proper use and qualification of lab devices.

  5. Continuous Improvement:

    • Participate in continuous improvement initiatives to enhance lab processes and efficiency.
    • Stay updated with the latest industry trends and regulatory requirements related to lab qualification.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Back

Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Quality Assurance Engineer

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related field;
  • +4 years of experience in testing area (test planning, test automation, test methods and tools);
  • QA certification or equivalent accreditation (e.g. ISTQB);
  • Scripting skills for test automation;
  • Knowledge on UI testing frameworks like Selenium, Cypress or similar;
  • Experience in test management tools (xRay, testRail) and reporting bugs;
  • Experience with API tools (Postman, Swagger, and SoapUI);
  • Experience in Java;
  • Experience with automated testing techniques and continuous delivery practices (Jenkins);
  • Good communication skills and fluency in English and Portuguese.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;

  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

SAP CPI BTP Integration Suite Tech Lead role

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: SAP CPI BTP Integration Suite Tech Lead role

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Braga. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • A minimum of four years' experience in SAP CPI development is required. 
  • Proficiency in Groovy scripting is essential. 
  • Familiarity with SAP event mesh or similar event brokers is preferred. 
  • Understanding event-driven architecture and principles is advantageous. 
  • Knowledge of the BTP Business Rule Engine is beneficial. 
  • Experience integrating SAP with third-party systems is necessary. 
  • Involvement in the complete lifecycle of at least two projects, from design to support, is expected. 
  • Demonstrated ability to work autonomously and collaboratively within international project teams is essential.
  • Hybrid model with at least one time per week at the office.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;

    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development
