SAP FI Funcional

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: SAP FI Funcional

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Experience and in-depth knowledge in SAP FI/CO (including S4 HANA) 
  • At least 5 years of experience implementing/supporting SAP solutions (preferred)
  • Experience in all aspects of the SAP implementation process
  • Business process analysis, system configuration, testing, documentation, end-user training and production support.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

  • Bachelor degree in any software related area
  • Experience working with SAS Foundation
  • Experience developing ETL process in SAS Viya 3.5
  • English fluent

    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!

  • Interest in API’s development 
  • High Proficiency in developing with Scala, Spark, Hadoop, and Hive 
  • Experience around Java, SpringBoot, API’s and microservices 
  • High Proficiency with relational databases

    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!

Lisbon

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Scrum Master

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • 4+ years of agile software development experience with solid technical expertise
  • Certified Scrum Master (e.g., CSP-SM, PSM);
  • Proficient problem-solving skills with a proactive mindset;
  • Interest in managing different stakeholder requirements in a dynamic environment, demonstrating strong leadership, self-motivation, and empathy;
  • Excellent communication skills;
  • Fluency in written and spoken English is required

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar;

Senior .NET Developer

Lisboa, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
Lisbon

We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Senior .NET Developer

Seniority: Senior (+5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • More than 5 years' professional experience in .Net (C#).
  • Experience more focus on back-end, but front-end experience will be valued;
  • More than 2 years' experience in designing technical architectures;
  • Experience in coordinating teams (between 1 and 3 people) will be valued;
  • Experience with Microsoft stack (.Net Core, SQL Server, SSIS, Windows, Office interoperability);
  • Knowledge of PL/SQL;
  • Experience in Azure Devops (pipelines, logs, infrastructure) will be valued;
  • Experience in RabbitMQ will be valued;
  • Experience in GIT;
  • Experience in defining functional requirements and technical design;
  • knowledge of CI/CD;
  • knowledge of Blazor.

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the top 10 big companies in the “Excellence Index”, an initiative which aims to reward the organizations that invest the most in the development

  • Higher Education in Engineering or Information Technologies. 
  • Working experience with all the life cycle stages of an application.

  • Working experience with C# .NET framework (4.5 and above) and .NET Core. 
  • Working experience with GIT and Gitflow. 
  • Working experience with SQL server and Azure SQL managed instance. 
  • Working experience with Azure Cloud and Azure DevOps. 
  • Experience with Jira and Confluence.

    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!

Senior and Mid JAVA developers

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Senior and Mid JAVA developers

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • 4+ Years working with java •
  • 3+ Years working with JAVASCRIPT-HTML-CSS (with ReactJs or AngularJS) 
  • Proficiency with java JDK 8 or greater 
  • Good knowledge of algorithms and data structures 
  • Spring, Spring boot, JSON, Swagger 
  • Experience with Microservices architecture & patterns 
  • Experience with Rest APIs 
  • Expertise with OAuth2 concepts and how to authenticate and authorize user and systems 
  • Expertise with API Token Security and signing http request with certificates 
  • Expertise with Tokenization – Data Security 
  • Knowledge of CI/CD principles and tools such as Jenkins, Maven 
  • Knowledge of GIT 
  • Knowledge of tomcat, Jboss, Spring Batch, Shell Scripting 
  • Expertise in Junit or other automated unit testing framework 
  • Experience with Postman 
  • Experience with a UI framework ReactJs 
  • Experience Oracle database 
  • Security asymmetric Encryption (JWT / JWS and JWE) 
  • Good Knowledge with JPA
  • B2 English Level
  • Nice to Have - Experience with SQL Databases 

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Senior Application Support Engineer/SRE

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Senior Application Support Engineer/SRE

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Good with Linux, Windows a plus;
  • Automated CI/CD process (example: XLR/XLD tools);
  • Linux environment;
  • Monitoring tools (ideally Zabbix) scheduling tools (ideally VTOM or Control-M) scripting (Shell, Python);
  • Adobe Campaign Knowledge on Mulesoft's Salesforce Customer and API Management cloud solutions would be beneficial;
  • Good level of English (mandatory) French is a plus;
  • DevOps mindset;
  • Good communication skills

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Senior full stack Developer - .Net Core + Azure & Blazor

Bruxelas, Belgium
Partial Remote Job
Belgium

Founded in 2005 in Lisbon by three visionary entrepreneurs, MoOngy quickly became a leading group in Engineering and Information Technology (IT) across Europe and North Africa. Today, with a presence in 14 countries and more than 40 subsidiary companies, MoOngy employs over 9,500 talents who share a common passion for innovation and excellence.

The International Mobility Recruitment Department is dedicated to enhancing the mobility of IT professionals throughout Europe, facilitating the placement of talents in the various markets where it operates.

Position: Senior full stack Developer - .Net Core + Azure & Blazor

 Location: Belgium

Type: Hybrid (2-3 days in the office)

 

 Power Skills:

  • You are ready to work on global projects and contribute to digital transformation across various industries;
  • You wish to expand your career beyond national borders and you are ready for an European adventure;
  • You want to be part of a global community of innovators.

 

Technical and Soft Skills:

As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile apps, cloud backend in Azure, Web interfaces and integration with legacy systems. This is an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge technology and contribute to the growth and success of our company.

 

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
  • At least 5 years of experience with Azure Cloud Development and .NET development (.net core is a must)
  • Strong proficiency in Azure Back-End development using Azure Functions, Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Storage.
  • 2 years of experience in front-end web development using Blazor
  • Experience with Docker conteiners, Dependency injection
  • Good knowledge of source control ( git ) and applies unit testing
  • Familiarity with SAFE/Scrum
  • C1 in English (speaking, written and reading) + C1 in Dutch and/or French (mandatory)
  • Is a hybrid position from Belgium, so the candidates must be in Belgium and have Work Permission to work in Belgium or must have European Passport and willing to relocate to Belgium.

 

Advantages of joining MoOngy:

International Mobility: Access to a dedicated international mobility department with personalized relocation programs to facilitate your move to a new country.

Career Development: Opportunities to work on projects with cutting-edge technologies in different countries and various sectors.

Continuous Learning: Access to ongoing and free training and career-oriented certifications.

Personal Growth: Exchange of ideas and best practices among professionals across Europe, fostering creativity and innovation in IT.

Global Citizen in the World of Technology: Opportunity to work in a global network of companies, with access to a wide range of challenging projects in different European markets.

@MoOngy Group we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills needed for the position are welcome!

Seniority: Senior (+5 years)

Type of position: Full Remote from Portugal

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Degree and/or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or similar;
  • 6+ years of experience developing web applications;
  • Know your way around relational databases and also non-relational stores;

Lisbon

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Lisbon. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field;
  • Excellent knowledge of object-oriented programming and familiarity with various design architectural patterns, and multithreading;
  • Knowledge of writing reusable Java libraries;
  • Knowledge of SQL databases (MySQL, Oracle, MSSQL, etc);
  • Knowledge in event streaming systems (Kafka);
  • Knowledge in Document Databases (MongoDB);
  • Prior experience with cloud technologies like Kubernetes, Docker, or similar;
  • Familiarity with Microservice Architecture;
  • Experience in implementing security protocols;
  • Proven experience as a Java Spring Boot Developer;
  • Strong proficiency in Java and in-depth understanding of the Spring and Spring Boot framework;
  • Experience with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript;
  • Experience with Git
  •

  • At least 5 years as Sysadmin;
  • Good knowledge of Linux and Windows environments;

  • Experience with JBoss, TomCat, Apache or IIS;
  • Experience with databases (Oracle, SQL Server and/or MySQL);
  • Experience with monitoring tools (ideally Zabbix or Grafana);
  • Experience with Infrastructure backups;
  • Knowledge of LDAP, Firewall, Reverse proxy, Active Directory and Kerberos;
  • Knowledge of Kubernetes and Openshift is a plus;
  • Good networking knowledge;
  • DevOps mindset;
  • Good level of English

    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

    • In hybrid System: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)

Seniority: Senior (5+ years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • Minimum 6 years of experience as a Site Reliability Engineer or in a similar role.
  • Proven track record of designing, implementing, and maintaining reliable and scalable systems.
  • Expertise in Linux system administration and troubleshooting.
  • Proficiency in Shell scripting for automation tasks.
  • Strong programming skills in Python for scripting and tool development.
  • Experience with MuleSoft for integration and API management.
  • Familiarity with Salesforce platform and technologies.
  • Hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
  • Experience with monitoring tools and incident response, ensuring timely identification and resolution of issues.
  • Availability for a hybrid regime at Porto (2x/week).
  • Fluency in English is mandatory.
 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Amesterdam, Netherlands
Partial Remote Job
Netherlands

The MoOngy Group is a network of agile consulting companies for Engineering and Digital professions representing:

  • 9500 employees
  • 45 companies
  • 14 countries
  • €730 million in revenue in 2023

 

Due to increased activity, the MoOngy Group is looking for a Software Build Engineer  (in Overijssel, in a hybrid system) 

 

For this position, we are only considering applicants who hold EU passports.

 

  • Requirements

    • Bachelor or Master level in the area of software engineering, information/computer science
    • At least 3 years of experience with software development in complex environments
    • Experience in software development in C++, Java; under Linux environment
    • Experience in building pipelines (e.g., Bazel and CMake), caching, and build distribution
    • Strong technical skills in software development and using technologies such as Linux, Jenkins, Nexus, Maven, and CI/CD (Jenkins / GitLab).
    • Experience in Agile/ Scrum development methods
    • You have strong communication skills and a fluent command of English.
    • Is a plus if you have some knowledge of Duch (A2)
    • You are a team player. Want to share, dare to learn!
    • Candidates must be in The Netherlands or Willing to Relocate to the Netherlands
    • We are conly considering applicants who hold EU passports

     

    What we offer

    • Competitive salary package
    • A good pension scheme
    • 25 vacation days
    • Laptop and mobile phone
    • Full travel allowance or an NS Business Card
    • Dutch course
    • Happy hours, corporate events and team building workshops
    • Monthly team activities
    • Legendary Meetings
    • A pleasant and informal working atmosphere within an international organization
    • Challenging projects based on your interests and experience
    • Room for own input and ideas
    • A tailor-made talent management program that will help you achieve your personal and professional goals

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience with years of experience as a Node.js developer, with demonstrable experience in building scalable and high-performance applications.
  • Proficiency in JavaScript, including ES6+ features.
  • Strong knowledge of Node.js frameworks such as Express, Koa, or NestJS.
  • Experience with relational and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL.
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies such as Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
  • Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus.
  • Availability for a REMOTE work (from Portugal).

UiPath Consultant

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: UiPath Consultant

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Experience in developing and testing software on the Windows platform, with proficiency in hands-on programming for Process Automation Software, specifically UiPath.
  • In-depth understanding of the UiPath robotic process automation tool.
  • Proficient in interpreting business processes from workflow diagrams and conceptualizing them as automated solutions.
  • Capable of combining business analysis skills with practical configuration of automated processes using Automation Software Products.
  • Strong communication skills, adept at presenting technical details to non-technical audiences.
  • Skilled in engaging with clients to gather business requirements.
  • Conducts code reviews and ensures adherence to coding standards.
  • 1x/week at the office

 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

UiPath Support

Porto, Portugal
Partial Remote Job
HIDDEN REGION

We’re looking for the special, unique, and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, teamwork.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

 

We are looking for an Amazing: UiPath Support

Seniority: Mid (3-5 years)

Type of position: Hybrid from Oporto. Candidates must be in Portugal already!

 

The amazing you, will have:

  • Bachelor's degree in a related field (e.g., Cybersecurity, Information Technology, Risk Management) or equivalent work experience.
  • 3+ years of experience in a technical support role, with a focus on RPA solutions.
  • Strong knowledge of UiPath platform, including Studio, Orchestrator, and Robot.
  • Proficiency in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues related to UiPath.
  • Familiarity with scripting languages such as VBScript, JavaScript, or Python.
  • Experience with SQL and relational databases.
  • Understanding of RPA best practices and design principles.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
  • Fluency in English is mandatory.
  • Availability for a hybrid regime, 1x/week, at Porto office (Portugal).
 

Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term;
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity;
  • Free training programs: our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster;
  • International projects in Benelux:  you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work;
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
    • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you;
    • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home;
    • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!

 

Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.
